fields.name: attic
fields.description: floor consisting of open space at the top of a house just below roof; often used for storage

fields.name: bathroom
fields.description: a room equipped with one or more toilets, showers, or bathtubs.

fields.name: bedroom
fields.description: a room used primarily for sleeping

fields.name: cellar
fields.description: room below ground level in a house, typically used for storing wine or coal

fields.name: closet
fields.description: a small room (or recess) or cabinet used for storage space

fields.name: dining room
fields.description: a room used for dining

fields.name: family room
fields.description: a recreation room in a private house

fields.name: foyer
fields.description: a large entrance or reception room or area

fields.name: garage
fields.description: an outbuilding (or part of a building) for housing automobiles

fields.name: hallway
fields.description: an interior passage or corridor onto which rooms open

fields.name: home office
fields.description: room in a house where business, professional, or clerical duties are performed

fields.name: home theater
fields.description: television and video equipment designed to reproduce in the home the experience of being in a movie theater

fields.name: home workshop
fields.description: workplace in a home where handcrafts or manufacturing are done

fields.name: kitchen
fields.description: a room equipped for preparing meals

fields.name: laundry room
fields.description: room where clothes are washed and ironed

fields.name: living room
fields.description: a room in a private house where people can sit and talk and relax

fields.name: pantry
fields.description: a small storeroom for storing foods or wines

fields.name: staircase
fields.description: a way of access (upward and downward) consisting of a set of steps

fields.name: trophy room
fields.description: a room for displaying awards

fields.name: wine cellar
fields.description: storage space where wines are stored
